title: Best of The Herd: 01/28/2021
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 01/28/2021
description:
-Ranking potential destinations for Deshaun Watson

-Why are people so enamored with Matt Stafford's talent? He doesn't win

-David Culley is who the Texans could get, not who they wanted

-The domino effect if the 49ers acquire Deshaun Watson


Guests: Greg Olsen, former Bears, Panthers & Seahawks Tight End

Greg Cosell, NFL Films
